oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Overdubbed Hank Williams Mother's Best #2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Unreleased edited excerpts of overdubbed recordings of performances from Hank Williams Mother's Best Flour Shows. Original recordings made in 1951.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Talking -- Intro With Guitar Tuning -- Seaman's Blues -- Pins and Needles (In My Heart) -- Talking -- Where The Old Red River Flows -- Talking -- On Top Of Old Smokey -- I Can't Tell My Heart That -- There's Nothing As Sweet As My Baby -- I'll Sail My Ship Alone -- If I Didn't Love You -- Gathering Flowers For The Masters Bouquet -- Alabama Waltz -- Talking -- Low And Lonely -- Talking -- I Hang My Head And Cry -- Talking -- Next Sunday Darling Is My Birthday -- Talking -- Deck Of Cards -- Talking -- Just When I Needed You -- Thirty Pieces Of Silver -- The Blind Child -- Show Intro -- Blue Eyes Crying In The Rain -- Talking - Cherokee Boogie -- Mothers Best Commercial -- Show Intro -- Tennessee Border -- Long Pause -- When The Fire Comes Down -- Drifting Too Far From Shore.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
